statements: UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 5000, expenses = 3000 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE financial_data SET profit = 2000, date = '2022-06-15' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 5000.25, expenses = 3500.75, date = '2022-03-15', profit = revenue - expenses WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE financial_data SET date = '2022-03-20', profit = revenue - expenses, expenses = revenue * 0.2, revenue = 7000 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE historical_financial_data SET opening_price = 1000.50 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE risk_analysis_results SET risk_score = 8.75, recommended_action = 'Hold' WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE historical_financial_data SET closing_price = 1500.50, volume = volume + 10000 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE risk_analysis_results SET risk_score = 8.75, recommended_action = 'BUY' WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE financial_data SET stock_price = 1500 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp'
UPDATE risk_metrics SET beta = 1.75, market_cap = 50000000 WHERE id = 10
UPDATE financial_data SET stock_price = 1500.00 WHERE company_name = 'Apple Inc' AND date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE risk_metrics SET beta = 1.5, market_cap = 100000.00 WHERE company_name = 'Tesla' AND date = '2022-05-15';

UPDATE financial_data SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE asset_name = 'Stock A';
